website_summaries.verdict: Contemporary design with an eye toward functionality. Good deal of interior space, coupled with a four-level layout, delivers plenty of organization.
pros: Hardwood is extremely durable and resistant to dirt and mud on shoes
Three-panel design maximizes access to interior space
cons: Lack of internal dividers can make it difficult to organize shoes

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware!!! P65 Cancer Warning
customer_reviews.text: I was really looking forward to having a cabinet to put all of my families shoes, but when I received the product it had a P65 cancer warning label on one of the panels. The seller failed to include that fact in the product information. The reason for the warning is the use of formaldehyde in the production process of this product, which over time can seep out of the wood eventually leading to some form of cancer. For more information on the results of this process, look up Lumber Liquidators and California compliant flooring. They used formaldehyde in their flooring and the consumers were getting cancer. This item is going to be returned.
customer_reviews.author: Sanders

customer_reviews.title: I bought 2!
customer_reviews.text: I love this cabinet, so much that I ended up buying 2! It stores all my shoes very well and I was able to store my tall boots in the last cabinet. The second one I bought was to put under my TV to store our DVDs.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth P

customer_reviews.title: Good Shoe & Entryway Solution
customer_reviews.text: Shoe cabinet arrived packed very carefully and organized with no missing parts or pieces. I wish it came with an anti-tip hardware with pre-drilled holes for households with small children, as I am always a little uncomfortable I’ll cause cosmetic damage on particle board when I have to drill them. Assembly was about average when compared to other furniture that comes in a box. No trouble as long as you are organized and follow directions. I added on addhesive drawer liner to the surface of the shelves to make them more durable and cleanable (because shoes). I am happy with this purchase. As long as you are not expecting hardwood heirloom quality furniture, this is an excellent quality shoe cabinet.
customer_reviews.author: J.M.R.

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought two and placed them side by side. Looks great but not simple to assemble. Took a good 20 minutes! I gave it 4 stars because it's not easy to put together and I wish the shelves were spaced a little further apart. I have to squeeze some shoes in to make them fit (men's shoes).
customer_reviews.author: scinsc

customer_reviews.title: No assembly instructions, poor quality and damaged parts!
customer_reviews.text: If there was a zero to grade, I would grade it ZERO! Came with no assembly instructions and poor material!!! Has to pay a person $50 for assembly and some of the parts have big dents on them! Cannot get a refund for this pc of garbage! Don’t buy!!!
customer_reviews.author: LPL

customer_reviews.title: Great Size Cabinet but Poor Quality Product - Plywood.
customer_reviews.text: it is good size cabinet and it can hold lots of shoes which I really liked. I am not happy with the quality of the product. No where in the description it is mentioned it is plywood (it is cheap quality) may be the fancier word they use is engineered wood but it is not as good quality as I have expected and exterior veneer which is some kind of paper just came off from some places even handled with delicacy. I am not sure how long it will last. According to the product quality it should be cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Shopping Queen

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: This piece is amazing. I can give it 5 stars as it did not arrive damaged. Amazon delivered this with care. This is an impressive piece. I purchased it for my home office to store items and I have a printer that sits on top of it. The piece is quality for the price and very sturdy. The only flimsy part is the back board but that's normal. Even the shelves are very sturdy. Instructions were easy to follow and put it together in under an hour. Definitely recommend this piece as it's very versatile
customer_reviews.author: Novak

customer_reviews.title: Terribly made.
customer_reviews.text: Um... it would have been really cool if the hole drilled in the bottom panel were drilled correctly. Yes, I am 100% sure this is the bottom panel and I have no idea how to assemble it because the holes are way off or don’t exist when compared to the directions.
customer_reviews.author: Eidyia LaVelle

customer_reviews.title: Sharp looking piece of furniture.
customer_reviews.text: The cabinet arrived on time and in tact. The shipment was pretty heavy but I was able to drag it in the house. Assembly was fairly simple. It took about 30 minutes to put It together while watching TV. But I enjoy the challenge of Ikea furniture. This is the best choice I have found to wrangle in all the shoes on the living room floor. It is stylish and fairly sturdy with the exception of the doors, which have thin slats. You would have to take reasonable care to avoid breakage. Although I have not been very careful and after one month in, so far so good! I would purchase again if my shoe collection expands. 😁
customer_reviews.author: snowbetty

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what i needed
customer_reviews.text: For anyone looking for a classy piece at a great price, this is it! This is perfect for storing shoes or anything else hanging around your living room taking up space. Very pleased with the size. I wear a size 13 men's shoes and it stores them perfect!! Get one!!!
customer_reviews.author: andrew wilkinson

customer_reviews.title: Nice cabinet! I'm glad I purchased it!
customer_reviews.text: I avoid purchasing furniture that looks like it's going to take forever to build. This guy took me about an hour a half to assemble which is not too bad considering my husband wasn't around to help and I was with my toddler daughter. It contains the exact amount of hardware so be careful about misplacing a piece. I believe it was a good purchase. It hides the shoes and stores other small miscellaneous items and it looks nice. I use the smaller cabinet for storing toilet paper and other bathroom things in small bins.
customer_reviews.author: JEB Tovar

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: This should have its own twitter account because it is cheap cheap cheap. Very disappointed in the quality of the construction. If anyone can make particleboard any thinner and cheaper these people found a way to do it. If you have a fan blowing in the room anywhere near it then get ready for it to be blown down Looks good but quality is one step below the dollar store
customer_reviews.author: Charles J. Humes

customer_reviews.title: Nice look but came broken.
customer_reviews.text: Bought because of the reviews. It looks very nice, but it was somewhat hard to assemble and one of the pieces was broken right where the screws are supposed to go in. we had already almost assembled the entire thing. The box was not damaged so we didn't think the piece was damaged. I did get a discount because it was damaged. BUT, the other option they gave us was to disassemble the entire thing and send back via UPS which I thought was ridiculous. It already taken us an hour to assemble it and it was unsturdy because the screws wouldn't fit into the broken piece. I wouldn't buy furniture from Amazon again.
customer_reviews.author: Molly

customer_reviews.title: Screws do not fit the feet on the bottom of the cabinet, door issues, could not completely assemble
customer_reviews.text: This is cheaply made and was a waste of my money, we could not even assemble the cabinet properly because the feet that are supposed to screwed in the bottom don't match the screws that come inside of the box. The doors won't attached into the hole to hinge. We threw the box away and its too much trouble to try and find a box to send back, total waste of $100. Very disappointed, and would like to be refunded or sent a new cabinet with proper components that fit into place.
customer_reviews.author: MelT

customer_reviews.title: Shoe Cabinet Is Well Built But...
customer_reviews.text: I like the way this espresso shoe cabinet looks and is quite good quality and holds quite a few shoes as advertised, but right out of the box the top panel that is in direct view came chipped from the factory! There no customer contact information (link is broken when clicked on and it goes nowhere) so I can simply request a replacement top panel that is intact and not damaged in any way. This issue with customer service needs to be corrected Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: KnowItAll

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoe Cabinet
customer_reviews.text: I was tired of the shoes piling up by our front door, and we decided to give this cabinet a shot. I'm so glad I did! Easy to put together, and beautiful addition to our entryway. Enough room for shoes for a household of 6! Only thing I did wrong when I put this together was that I didn't insert the wooden pins in far enough and chipped a small piece of the bottom of the cabinet off. Not a big deal to me because it ended up being covered up by another piece of wood. No regrets with this piece of furniture yet.
customer_reviews.author: Robin La La

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and hard to put together. Looks alright though.
customer_reviews.text: This cabinet was a PAIN to put together. It took me 2 hours and one of the inside pieces was printed backwards. None of the bags of hardware were labeled so it made finding the right pieces difficult. Definitly not a piece I would recommend for longtime use as it is made of cheap partical board. The shelving is adjustable and since I plan on using it for games and cards I decided not to put the shelves in. Altogether its a decent piece just not worth more than $70. If you're looking for something temporary it does look OK just dont expect it to be anything permanent.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe storage with adjustable shelves
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my home's mudroom/foyer area. I can't stand the sight of exposed shoes so my highest priority when looking for shoe storage was the ability to conceal the shoes. This thing was HEAVY and took quite sometime to put together, but I believe this is functionally better than the ikea shoe cabinets. The backing of the cabinet is a flimsy chipboard material, but if you plan on pushing this against a wall, you will not notice this at all. I would recommend putting some felt furniture pads under the legs to prevent scratching your floors.
customer_reviews.author: Ricky Wu

customer_reviews.title: Decent cabinet
customer_reviews.text: This cabinet has been with us for 3 years. We have 3 kids and don't have any issues with it. We keep games and toys in it and never had any problems with stability and only a few scratches that can be filled with the marker they give you. And we have moved with it once. Cleans up quickly and easily. Easy to put together and it looks so good. Great value for your money.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica H.

customer_reviews.title: Assembly wasn’t too terrible (nothing like IKEA haha)
customer_reviews.text: Decent size, was able to get quite a few pairs of shoes in there. Assembly wasn’t too terrible (nothing like IKEA haha). Took my husband and I about an hour, unboxing and all. Not as long as I was expecting and it is wobbly - something to do with the legs maybe...we plan on changing out the legs so it won’t wobble but other than that, very happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Kit Lavender

customer_reviews.title: Stylish organization that helps a room feel less cluttered.
customer_reviews.text: I love this! It makes my room look more organized and stylish. This is under my hanging t.v. so it doubles as a console. One side holds my shoes and the smaller side holds my cat food. All organized and behind doors! The reason for the 4 out of 5 stars is the quality of the finish. It's like paper was glued one. It was the most noticeable when putting it together on the slats of the doors. Haven't had any issues with it yet though. The shelves can come out for taller shoes or items, which is nice. Great for any kind of storage.
customer_reviews.author: S. Meads

customer_reviews.title: It’s okay
customer_reviews.text: This stand is okay. It’s shorter than I imagined or it looks in the pictures but that’s my own fault for not checking. It’s pretty thin and doesn’t appear very sturdy but does look okay. Took my husband about an hour to build and he said the directions were easy to read. I don’t know if I’d buy it again if I had the option but I will be keeping it. Just probably in the basement instead of the main living space. For the money it is okay.
customer_reviews.author: PMG

customer_reviews.title: Flat cabinet. Can’t store heels.
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited about this cabinet until I realized the shelves aren’t high enough to store any sort of heel. The shelves also aren’t adjustable. So this cabinet has become my flats cabinet, but now instead of one place for my shoes I still have like three which defeats the purpose. It wasn’t too bad to put together. The directions don’t have any words just graphics if I remember correctly.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Missing a leg
customer_reviews.text: My order is missing a leg. There's no support available so I have no idea whom to contact. This leg is important because there's a panel/frame resting on that area. Other than that this looks beautiful and worth the $104. Be mindful though: the slats are very thin, so make sure not to close, pull, or lean on them. I'm happy to give this product 5 stars once this missing piece is sent to me.
customer_reviews.author: Fiona

customer_reviews.title: Don't assemble the door hinge pins upside down
customer_reviews.text: The door hinge pins should be been designed with different diameters on either end, as it is, it fits both ends. Be sure and place the longer end of the pin into the door itself. I made the mistake of placing them upside down. I was putting the last piece, the top onto the assembly and it wouldn't quite go. So naturally I forced it with good whack of my hand, thus driving the pin through the flimsy laminate finish. Money and time wasted, this POS was ruined. Went right into the garbage. Nobody's fault but my own for buying crap and expecting it to go well.
customer_reviews.author: JoeW Tio Pepe

customer_reviews.title: Overall it looks great and is great for low profile shoes like flats ...
customer_reviews.text: I thought this shoe cabinet would solve my problems of storing my shoes which were mostly high heels and it actually didnt. All my high heels didn't fit in the shelving unless we take out 2 of the shelvings. Overall it looks great and is great for low profile shoes like flats and tennis shoes. I also wish it was a tad bit higher because then maybe each shelf would be much higher in distance. I would return this if it weren't for my Fiance having built it already.
customer_reviews.author: Flor A.

customer_reviews.title: Great way to hide a litter box
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to hide a cat litter box in, and it should work really good. Easy to assemble, and better than some of the cat poop palaces available out there. Had to cut a hole in a separating wall and left the door and shelves out, makes it for a great way to hide the box if you are dealing with cramped place and a bathroom so small that even a litter box won’t fit (it really fits but we didn’t want it to be the center of attention in a single bathroom in the apartment)
customer_reviews.author: Ilya Kagan

customer_reviews.title: Nice Cabinet!!!
customer_reviews.text: We are very happy with this cabinet!! It was just the solution we needed as our entryway is on the small side. I have about 3 pairs of ankle boots, and my kids have a few pairs in there too. My Husband wears size 15 shoes and they do fit! He just has to slide them in sideways. It took him about an hour to install. He said it was a bit cumbersome, but worth it in the end. I highly recommend if you need to find storage solution without breaking the bank. I’m thinking of changing out the knobs for a little extra flare, but as is, it still looks fine.
customer_reviews.author: A.C.

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoe Cabinet!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this shoe rack to place in the entryway of our home over 3 years ago, and are still very happy with it. It was easy to assemble and is a perfect option for us. It hides all the shoes that would otherwise end up in unsightly piles by the front door, and also is a cute and functional accent piece. We have a decorative bowl for keys and pictures on top, as well as a space for items that we need to remember to take with us when walking out the door. I would highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Buttercup

customer_reviews.title: better than i expedted
customer_reviews.text: Decent and good quality. took me a while to assemble it, i think about 1 1/2hr. the tricky part was putting the top and doors. Worth the price... will definitely get another one later.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Keep the Corona at the door!
customer_reviews.text: I just purchased this to keep the corona from potentially entering my house on everyone’s shoes. It was a total mess at the door prior with everyone’s shoes all over the floor. This Cabinet is absolutely perfect for the price and it keeps everything nice and neat and it looks great! I even set up a little station on top to keep masks gloves and antibacterial wipes organized.
customer_reviews.author: Allanafl

customer_reviews.title: Cute little cabinet
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good little cabinet for shoes, it'salso very cute! It took me about an hour of lazily putting it together. The hardest part is putting the top on by myself, otherwise it was a breeze. All the pieces lined up fairly square for me. Overall not a bad purchase for a particle board piece of furniture. Can't comment on how sturdy it is since I just got it today.
customer_reviews.author: V. M.

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty to look at with lots of storage.
customer_reviews.text: While the quality is no the best I think it’s perfect for its price range. For the price you’re not going to get solid wood anywhere. The amount of storage is awesome. We have 7 people in the house and all our daily shows fit. We did cut some lenoleum and then some carpet pieces to layer in it in case of any wet shoes going into it so it will last longer. It is a beautiful piece of furniture.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Very heavy and sturdy wood but awful instructions
customer_reviews.text: The box it came in was very heavy, which I don’t mind considering it will be more sturdier than something lighter. The color is very pretty. The smell of the paint/sealant is extremely strong tho and reeks of formaldehyde, which is a carcinogen. I was disappointed to find out from another review and not from the seller themselves before I bought it. Thankfully, it will stay on the front porch and no one will be near it for longer than necessary. The instructions also involved no words and just pictures. It wasn’t awfully hard to put it together using common sense but it definitely took me a good 2 hours to put everything together.
customer_reviews.author: N.A

customer_reviews.title: Love it, just weird directions.
customer_reviews.text: I love this shoe storage cabinet! It’s modern and looks so good with our decore. It’s sturdy and for my boyfriend easy to set up. The only issue he had with set up was that the picture didn’t match the set up. Each panel was marked A,B,C and while he set it up, he noted that the picture of panel C and B didn’t match the way it was in the directions after installing them, but it still worked out in the end.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Delgado

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking piece
customer_reviews.text: Arrived sooner than expected, in good condition. It took me about 1.5 hours to assemble, pretty easy. Looks great, shelves are a bit short but if you put in high-top sneakers or boots on their sides (like in a shoebox) they fit fine. Giving 4 stars instead of 5 because after I was done I noticed that I was missing 1 of the 2 center legs and no pre-drilled hole, no extra screws either. Not sure if it'll make a difference with time. Quality is decent, for the price. Otherwise, very happy, nice functional piece.
customer_reviews.author: MD

customer_reviews.title: Looks Great
customer_reviews.text: The cabinet was due to arrive twobdays prior to date i did receive it. Said itvwas to be here by 8pm. It arrived at 9pm. We put it together next day. Not to hard to follow the instructions. We had to glue the back on it would stay otherwise. Its a very good looking piece of furniture. Our shoe storage cabinet.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Aden

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the price
customer_reviews.text: Purchased 2 these for storage in our living room. Works perfectly. Didn't use all the shelves to allow room for bins. Super easy to put together. 1st one took about an hour 2nd one was much faster. Seems sturdy, does have a strong ordor thats lingering on.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Cannot believe this
customer_reviews.text: In the unpacking we found a note of gratitude for purchasing the item. At first I was confused but then I realized why, because of the pandemic every review I have recently seen is negative and telling others not to order because its from China. Not every Chinese has the virus and it is all over the world not just in China. The risk of getting infected due to a purchase can happen from any location the item is being shipped from. Don't be a@@holes and blame a whole country for a natural disaster. They need to feed their children too.
customer_reviews.author: SirenBoss23

customer_reviews.title: Much better than expected
customer_reviews.text: I didn't know what to expect, but i was pleasantly pleased. It took a while to assemble but still it was easy to set up. I love how it looks, i had hoped it will hold more shoes, but im a size 12, so i was only able to fit about 21 pairs inside. Probably my only downer. But for the quality as compared to the price, i think its good value really... I encourage anyone looking to purchase to go ahead
customer_reviews.author: Tee

customer_reviews.title: Overall happy, but uneven doors
customer_reviews.text: I really like the look of this, and it definitely serves its purpose well. I don't love that the doors don't line up perfectly. Since they simply sit on a peg, there's no real way to adjust them. It's really not that noticable overall, but I know, so it bothers me. If those little things don't bother you, I would 100% recommend. Looks great and feels sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Quilliams

customer_reviews.title: UGH what a nightmare
customer_reviews.text: If I could give this product a 0 I would. Holes where not in the correct place so I need to drill my own wholes. Screws for the sides went right through and now not sturdy at all had to glue everything together and can't put the screws back in this made the sides loose. Top would not fit on again wholes are not lined up correctly. Unable to get the magnet strip in doesn't just go in wholes are to small. This was a $150 nightmare. Save yourself and skip over this item. Oh it did arrive 1 a week early. - Returned to defects.
customer_reviews.author: J. Alfonse

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: This item looks great once assembled. It is just not very sturdy. Corner piece got bumped and broke off right away. I would make sure this item isn’t in a high traffic area and you’ll probably be fine. Came with a couple of scratches in the doors but it’s on the inside where you can’t necessarily see it.
customer_reviews.author: A. Wolfe

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe storage that looks nice too
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe storage that looks nice too. While I would never have a room of particle board furniture but I needed a shoe storage cabinet and didn't want to spend a ton of money. This piece is sturdy and looks nice in a room of more expensive furniture. My only complaint is that the top is the same as the sides and I worry if you were to place a cup on top without a coaster that it would immediately get cup rings.
customer_reviews.author: Jwallen4vt

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to assemble
customer_reviews.text: The directions were difficult to understand. I have assembled several things on my own but this product was very difficult. However, I was able to return it for a full refund! After I finally put it together it was not sturdy and the doors would not stay shut....thinking I did a step wrong during the assembly. Took the whole thing apart and still got a refund!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute! Holds lots of shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I recently moved into a home with a huge walk in closet. I wanted a place to store my shoes other than on the shelves. I chose this! It’s super cute, pretty easy to put together (took me about an hour or so with a little helper). Holds pretty much everything except my tall boots/heeled booties.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Just put this together and love the way it looks and it’s functionality. Took about 40 mins for 2 people to put this together which we didn’t think was hard to do. Easily fits sneakers, high heels, sandals.... boots would have to be laid on its side though. Only thing that I dislike is that the description says espresso and it’s definitely black.... not an inch of brown which you would expect espresso to be. Other than that we like it.
customer_reviews.author: Liz Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe cabinet.
customer_reviews.text: Really like this shoe cabinet its definitely worth ur money. I was able to fit 28 pairs of my husbands shoe in this who wears size 12. It is very sturdy. Took about an hr and half to put it together with 2 people. The instructions are all pics and the screws does have numbers and separated in packets which did help a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Sadia Ferdousi

customer_reviews.title: Looks great!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to hold our kids games, puzzles and art supplies. The only thing I don't like are the knobs. However they can be easily changed out to something different. To give the piece a more high end feel. I also like that the shelves can be taken out and moved around.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn buhl

customer_reviews.title: nice looking shoe console table with plenty of storage.
customer_reviews.text: yes, I really enjoy this console and I am basically using this for my shoes.I am no Imelda Marcos, But having all my shoes out of the way makes my place feel a lot less cluttered! Easy to assemble and fast delivery. Would recommend this product to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: hedge hog

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in great condition. Color is a very dark brown. Assembly is similar to IKEA products. Doors do not feel heavy duty, but the rest of it feels stable. Low top shoes fit fine. Mens size 12 and up not ideal. No complaints for the price.
customer_reviews.author: baat

customer_reviews.title: Bit of a pickle!
customer_reviews.text: I bought one, had no problems putting it together and loved it so decided to order a second one. However, right in the end when I was about to put the last bit on which was the door hinge, the wholes were made too small! Now I cant return the thing coz its 90% built but cant complete it. What am I supposed to do with that!
customer_reviews.author: Hootan

customer_reviews.title: nice
customer_reviews.text: It looked like the picture. Only reason I am giving it three stars is because the doors and other parts had some type of dust on them. You will need two people to put this together .. it was time consuming but once its done ... its done... so far so good..
customer_reviews.author: Amber D

customer_reviews.title: great!
customer_reviews.text: looks pretty good, serves it's purpose well. It's not hard to assemble (and it comes with instruction), it just involves many parts, which might take a good 10-30 min if you're doing it by yourself. fits about 20 shoes comfortably for us (including flip flops and sandals)
customer_reviews.author: Amiel Chen

customer_reviews.title: Convenient and modern look.
customer_reviews.text: We live in apartments, and I absolutely hate seeing shoes on the little tile square we have in front of our door, especially when guests come in and all those shoes are taking space. This shoe storage looks great in our hallway, if you could call it that, and is very convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Irina

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble.  Looks great and it feels sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: It took me about 20 mins to assemble with limited tools. That's with me having some hard time figuring out how the feet gets attached for a couple of minutes. Once assembled, the entire unit feels very sturdy. The doors line up perfectly. I didn't even have to make any adjustments. I would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: eelcram

customer_reviews.title: Mixed Feelings
customer_reviews.text: Great piece except you need two people for assembly, especially with the doors and top piece. you need one person to hold doors steady while the second person aligns top piece and just pushes down to get doors and top piece to fit like a puzzle. I gave it 3 stars for overall rating because the top of the cabinet came with a deep and long scratch. Even though I like the piece I paid for a brand new piece not a blemished one. (Picture of scratch attached). Delivery was slow! I ordered this because it was prime which meant faster shipping but they delayed it twice.
customer_reviews.author: Mqs213

customer_reviews.title: Damaged Packaging But Super Happy Otherwise
customer_reviews.text: This was pretty easy for my husband to assemble and looks attractive. I can’t wait to get rid of my dusty shoe rack! However, the package was damaged in a big way... fortunately the pieces were not damaged and none of the hardware was lost, but it could have easily fallen out of the huge hole in the corner of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Magpie63

customer_reviews.title: The assembling is easy, but I don't know if it is because ...
customer_reviews.text: The assembling is easy, but I don't know if it is because of my skill or the manufacture, some parts are not aligned very well. Also the space between each layer is not that big, so I cannot put big shoes like boots. I can put only 16 pairs of shoes, if you think it is enough for you, then it is fine.
customer_reviews.author: Ray Chu

customer_reviews.title: Terrific way to hide shoes
customer_reviews.text: We are a family of six. You can imagine the mess that all of our shoes at the front door leave. We wanted something to hide them, and this is just perfect. As a general rule, each of my children has two pairs of shoes. A regular pair and a pair of sandals. We live in the desert so we don’t need to deal with snow boots. There is plenty of room for all of our shoes. Given that the toddler shoes are so small, we actually have room for several more pairs of shoes. My husband wears a size 12, and his shoes fit in there as well.
customer_reviews.author: TQS213

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly what I needed for my office and you can’t beat that price. The slats feel a little flimsy but they don’t get touched much so it’s fine. The instructions were a bit confusing at first, but overall it’s still easy to assemble while watching tv.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: We have 4 kids and this is a lifesaver.
customer_reviews.text: It is easy to assemble and it has enough room for my wife and our 4 kids. We've gotten into the habit of taking shoes off at the door and now they have a place to put them without cluttering the walkway.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremiah

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: Love this in my entryway! It looks so much better than a pile of shoes in the hallway. We put it together in less than 30 minutes and it’s really light (until you load it with shoes). This was such a great investment no regrets with this buy lol
customer_reviews.author: Lexy

customer_reviews.title: Loved it up until...
customer_reviews.text: I did love this closet up until it started falling apart the wooden strips that it comes with are very thin and breaks very easily. One of the door on this closet is already off. They broke one by one.
customer_reviews.author: SRAU2012

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to our house.
customer_reviews.text: Just what we needed for items we use a lot when leaving the house. Shoes, purse, hats, gloves, etc. assembled fairly easy. Only negative is being old and having to sit on the floor. Being younger would be a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Lowell P.

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking piece at a descent price
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking piece at a descent price. Directions could be a little better but not horrible. If you're experienced at putting furniture together you won't have a problem. Packaging materials are a pain to deal with....little pieces of Styrofoam everywhere. Slight blemishes here and there....not sure if I did that while assembling. Shelves can be taken out to fit larger shoes or boots. Can fit about 18 pairs of regular shoes. Nicer than having an open shoe rack. Shipped fast. Happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Gregg

customer_reviews.title: What i envisioned
customer_reviews.text: Best purchase ever. I envisioned what i wanted and needed to store mine and my sons shoes. Nothing seemed to be exactly what I wanted. That is until I saw this. It's absolutely perfect and looks great. Also it stores a decent amount.
customer_reviews.author: Bsugar

customer_reviews.title: The answer to shoe organization!
customer_reviews.text: This shoe cabinet looks beautiful in my mud room! We had shoes everywhere - were tripping over them constantly. Now they are organized and most of all, out of sight! This was definitely worth the money. My husband put it together in less than an hour. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Susan in VA

customer_reviews.title: Picture is accurate.
customer_reviews.text: I had no trouble putting this together, all the parts were there, there were no scratches, all the holes matched, etc. It serves my purpose very well and is well made and sturdy for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Cat T

customer_reviews.title: Directions Terrible!
customer_reviews.text: The directions were terribly written and there is no way one individual could assemble this. I started it, but my daughter and son-in-law had to finish it. It looks nice, but what a mess in trying to put it together. The screws for the legs were under another piece and I had to take it apart to be able to go on to the next step.
customer_reviews.author: Myrna L. Bair

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Product
customer_reviews.text: I usually hate putting furniture/other stuff together because most of them come with horrible instructions which cause you to take more time or re-do to correct mistakes. But I experienced none of that with this product. I bought three of them. The first one took me 44 minutes, and the others took me 20 minutes each. The product is well designed and manufactured. Everything fits perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: NYC Girl

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and good for the price
customer_reviews.text: It is very sturdy. More than I expected. I bought kind a same product before with two doors only, and it was not as thick and sturdy as this one with three doors. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Celina

customer_reviews.title: Looks great. Very sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: Using this to store my shoes. Looks great in my bedroom. Smaller than I wanted but I plan to buy another to stack onto this one and double the size. The cabinet is pretty and seems very durable. I really like this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Have had this a couple weeks now and love it. Easy to put together although some of the diagrams were confusing. Not hard to figure out. Looks nice and holds all of our games. Planning on getting another one to fill in the rest of wall space.
customer_reviews.author: Amber W.

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality for the Price
customer_reviews.text: This turned my corner basket full of overflowing shoes into a lovely centerpiece that hides all of them. This was a real great touch and seems to be good quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Ciara McElwaine

customer_reviews.title: This is a great shoe cabinet!
customer_reviews.text: Retired an old shoe cabinet which was not sturdy and fell apart. This new cabinet was easy to assemble, well proportioned and well finished (this is not a solid wood cabinet) and feels solid. I especially like the vented louver doors which work well and are more sturdy than expected. The hardware works well. Best of all it looks great!
customer_reviews.author: D Takumi H

customer_reviews.title: When the item arrive and was asymbled I thought it was too good to be true
customer_reviews.text: I waited a few months purposely to write this review. When the item arrive and was asymbled I thought it was too good to be true. It went together too easy, and I for sure thought it would get loose and flimsy after a little use. After several months AND a big move this cabinet is still as solid as the day we constructed it. Very durrable and looks amazing! Very pleased with the shipping as well.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Perdue

customer_reviews.title: Total worth it
customer_reviews.text: I was remodeling my living room and I got rid of my old shoe case and was hesitant at first but I feel in love with it. It fits all of my family shoes. I love this product. My living room does not look like crap and it goes well with my decor.
customer_reviews.author: Julia Chia

customer_reviews.title: Great investment, well made
customer_reviews.text: This thing is well made and heavy once assembled so make sure you have someone else there to help you carry it to its place in your home. My dog has a shoe problem and this has already paid for itself in the amount of shoes I've saved from my pup. Lol i would buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria s.

customer_reviews.title: A MUST for shoe storage or any storage at all.
customer_reviews.text: The set up or build process was very easy. My 5 yr old son and I did it. Everything besides a screw driver or drill came with the package. The cabinet is very sturdy. The espresso color was darker than I expected. I was planning on painting the cabinet white at first but the color actually goes pretty nicely with our current furniture so I’m keeping it as is. Very nice product!!!! Def worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Mele U.

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for the money
customer_reviews.text: I like the looks of it we are using if to put our shoes in the outside Porch its very spacious and get the job done, the one issue i have with it is that the magnets that hold the door shut are not the best the only plug onto the top board and after some use they come lose and fall off and if you are not paying attention they will get lost, I would recommend using super glue on the nobs that attach to the top panel to make sure they dont fall off, other than that i really like it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the money.
customer_reviews.text: The knobs that meet on the large side doors are uneven. I replaced the box ones with gold knobs. Leveled up the look. I use it for dishes, serving wear and glasses. Great for small spaces.
customer_reviews.author: No

customer_reviews.title: Meet my expectations
customer_reviews.text: Meet my expectation, but not better. Easy assemble took 1.5hr to get it done. The veneer can be scratched easily. I still wounding how to make it drips proof from water.
customer_reviews.author: dinohippo

customer_reviews.title: don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: half the holes were not driled for assembly, corners held together with thin plastic supports and 2 pieces of thin particle board taped together to support the back of the case. Didn't even attempt to put this million piece puzzle together.
customer_reviews.author: girlygirl

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Was a bit time consuming to assemble, but the instructions were very clear and easy to follow. Just what I needed for my home office (instead of using it to store shoes, I am using it to store office and crafting supplies....works perfectly)!! =)
customer_reviews.author: TamaraL

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the money
customer_reviews.text: I was very lucky to have a friend to help install. This is certainly a two man job (if you want to do it correctly). Assembly only took a little over 30 minutes. Any lament can build this in no time. The quality is superb. I love the fit and finish and this will surely become a great piece for our home.
customer_reviews.author: Bo

customer_reviews.title: A lot shorter than I thought but it holds all ...
customer_reviews.text: A lot shorter than I thought but it holds all the kids' shoes and gets the messy pile off the floor! I put it together despite a 3 year old "helping"
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this shoe holder!! The only thing I don’t like is how flimsy the slats in the doors are. We move a lot and I have a feeling they are going to get broken but for the price and how easy it was to put together we’ll just get another one. It did arrive with some scratches but nothing that I wasn’t able to cover.
customer_reviews.author: Alison's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: This is being used to hold our stereo on the top and dishes inside in our dining room (not enough space in kitchen). Instructions are clear and easy to follow. Everything fit together nicely
customer_reviews.author: Stefanie

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: This was fairly simple to put together with the tools provided or standard tools I had at home. Quality piece of furniture for the cost. Although advertised as a shoe cabinet, I use mine for a TV stand and have various pieces of items stored in the lower cabinet.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: First of all its a great price. It's not super heavy duty or anything but it holds a bunch of shoes and it is pleasing to the eye. I have this at the entry of my home and it keeps the shoes out of the door way and not on display! LOVE it!
customer_reviews.author: Carli-Anne

customer_reviews.title: get this soon:))
customer_reviews.text: 5 staaaar, amazing, good looking, all our shoes is inside :))) i’m so happy with my purchase.. will recommended to everyone
customer_reviews.author: zurab

customer_reviews.title: Excellent shoe storage solution, so far so good on the durability too!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent shoe storage solution in the living room. We have two toddlers who play with everything and this has so far survived them after 3 months.
customer_reviews.author: godami

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe cabinet
customer_reviews.text: Great piece! Typical build it yourself plywood. But item was well packaged and instructions WERE included, although a little difficult to find amonst all the styrofoam. Corners all squared up nicely, even the doors!
customer_reviews.author: jills

customer_reviews.title: Poor shipping/packaging
customer_reviews.text: Cabinet is cracked on the top but cannot return it, need it for state law virus protection. Very unhappy it is damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Ann E. Duffy

customer_reviews.title: A great shoe storage idea!
customer_reviews.text: It looks great! Tends to collect the smell of stinky feet, but you can avoid this with an airfreshener. Looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Fred Kreller

customer_reviews.title: Nice and good looking
customer_reviews.text: Really nice piece. Great looking. I will caution you, the wood is fragile so take care during assembly. Dropped a door and it chipped. Repaired w/ wood glue
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not a good product
customer_reviews.text: It’s smaller than what I expected. It’s hard to fit two pairs of shoes in each section.The material is cheap and easy to break. They are not real wood. A damaged piece was sent to me. I am not quite happy with this product. but think about the other way, you might just get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Customer Support
customer_reviews.text: I love the storage cabinet, it's exactly what I wanted, and for a great price. Unfortunately, (2) hardware pieces were missing. After some searching I was able to find an email address. The Rep has been very nice, unfortunately 3 weeks later I’ve received the wrong replacement parts TWICE. Hopefully the 3rd set sent is the right one
customer_reviews.author: EPattillo

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful piece
customer_reviews.text: First of all, I am impressed of how well this piece is packaged and there was no damage. The whole thing isn't hard to put together, however, the panels are not labeled, and it's making assembling extremely lengthy. Overall, this is very cheap for its quality.
customer_reviews.author: Dat Vo

product_meta.title: Baxton Studio Warren Shoe-Storage Cabinet, Espresso
product_meta.description: Are you really into shoes? Our eight-shelf Warren espresso shoe-storage cabinet offers the answer for style-conscious individuals whose space is at a premium. With such sharp, contemporary styling, you won’t be forced to stow your footwear in an upstairs closet. Three slatted front doors feature sturdy solid-wood handles and the subdued espresso finish permits placement in more ornate surroundings. Overall Dimensions: 44.5"W X 14.625"D X 27.5"H, Left side shelves: 28.125"W X 11.75"D X 5.375"H, Right-side shelves: 14.125"W X 11.75"D X 5.375"H.
feature_bullets: Overall Dimensions: 44.5"W x 14.63"D x 27.5"H; Left side shelves: 28.12"W X 11.75"D X 5.37"H, Right side shelves: 14.12"W X 11.75"D X 5.37"H
Three hinged front doors with solid-wood handles
4 fixed-height shelves on each side for versatile shoe storage
Medium-Density fiberboard and engineered-wood frame with dark-brown (espresso) PU veneer finish

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars1,104 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
